formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'REALTIME_DESTROY' =-
[Syntax] REALTIME_DESTROY(family,fieldmatch[,value[,delim1[,delim2]]])
[Synopsis] RealTime Destroy Function
[Description] This function acts in the same way as REALTIME(....) does, except that it destroys matched record in RT engine.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
